pageContent: Background: As the incidence of prostate cancer has, until recently, increased in most developed countries, the rates of prostate biopsies, required for histological diagnosis, will also have increased. Little is known about the physical after-effects of prostate biopsy outside randomised control trials. We investigate reports on the physical effect of prostate biopsy undertaken in men in routine practice.

metaData.source:
The role of the support group, "Us Too"
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/8087789/
